response.overview: Hazme Las Uñas is an adult fantasy film by Spanish queer director Perlita León. Inspired by Almodóvar's cinematic atmospheres, this Spanish-speaking erotic lesbian movie explores hand fetishism and immerses the viewer into the glamorous world of nail salons.  Watch romance unfold between the salon owner Marivi (Jane Jones) and her favourite client Susi (Gia Green), and experience the exaggerated and melodramatic world of Spanish folklore, where feelings are untamed and dialogues are intriguingly silly.
response.title: Hazme las Uñas
